message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice,  $12000 is a bit more than I'm looking to spend right now.  Would you be willing to come down to $9000?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $10500. Let me know if that's more to your liking!
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $10500 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  How about we split the difference and settle on $9750?
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $9750, Bob. I can do $10000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Let's see if we can meet in the middle again!
